channel.title: Help with making my client
channel.description: hey guys, Can somebody get a basic client that works and edit it with the ip and port i send you in a pm if you can help me, i would do it myself, but it just doesn't seem to work on my laptop. I have tried atleast 4 tutorials and none have worked for me. Please guys, i would really appreciate it! and i can also send you the background image for client please? Thanks! Lolipownu

item.title: Help with making my client
item.dc:creator: @lolipownu lolipownu
item.description:
@lolipownu wrote:

thanks man, there are multiple ip addresses so just choose one:

IP ADDRESSES

pvp-worldz.no-ip.biz
pvp-worldz.no-ip.org
pvp-worldz.zapto.org
freepvp.zapto.org

PORT
(default)

Background image for client:

Please if you can do this, upload it to uppit, filefront, megaupload or whatever
Thanks!
